command_string: Switch on the microwave. Set the upper tube temperature to 110°C, select the cooking function as upper and lower heating tube, set the lower tube temperature to 150°C, and adjust the time to 20 minutes.

execution_history.mismatch: The goal state requires the variable_function_selection to have the value 'upper_and_lower_tubes'. The feedback value is 'upper and lower heating tube with convection'. Additionally, in the variable range, 'upper_and_lower_tubes' matches the goal value better than the feedback value. Therefore, the goal has not been reached yet. Since this is open loop execution, given a wrong model, we will terminate now.
